channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description: @BovyMaltz Ah, this is the worst case scenario, then, since that’s not the one I spotted.
item.source:markdown: @BovyMaltz Ah, this is the worst case scenario, then, since that’s not the one I spotted.

item.description: @BovyMaltz I think I found it. Pointing it out is going to make it feel worse, though, isn’t it?
item.source:markdown: @BovyMaltz I think I found it. Pointing it out is going to make it feel worse, though, isn’t it?

item.description: My traditional birthday selfie, with my traditional birthday DQ® Blizzard®, this time on my sunny balcony. #BalconyTO https://t.co/2gPqYhSdsy
item.source:markdown: My traditional birthday selfie, with my traditional birthday DQ® Blizzard®, this time on my sunny balcony. #BalconyTO https://t.co/2gPqYhSdsy

item.description: @Kimli There should be an @untappd for everything.
item.source:markdown: @Kimli There should be an @untappd for everything.

item.description: First time in a long time I’ve seen Chinese in an English-language novel. That’s a phrase I’d get very familiar with early on in my Chinese lessons, so I got the joke right away. https://t.co/1AhhqOA5GB
item.source:markdown: First time in a long time I’ve seen Chinese in an English-language novel. That’s a phrase I’d get very familiar with early on in my Chinese lessons, so I got the joke right away. https://t.co/1AhhqOA5GB

item.description: @joshtpm Has the law set a date for when it’s coming?
item.source:markdown: @joshtpm Has the law set a date for when it’s coming?

item.description: @rtanglao Possibly. I don’t have a flight back to Toronto booked yet, so it’s a fairly open-ended trip.
item.source:markdown: @rtanglao Possibly. I don’t have a flight back to Toronto booked yet, so it’s a fairly open-ended trip.

item.description: If you’re in Toronto and love this movie, or haven’t seen it yet, see it this coming Thursday at @RevueCinema in Roncesvalles. https://t.co/HtMzNweixM

item.description: @Kimli That sucks. A lot. Hoping for the best. Let’s connect on LinkedIn. There’s technical writers in my network that may be hiring.
item.source:markdown: @Kimli That sucks. A lot. Hoping for the best. Let’s connect on LinkedIn. There’s technical writers in my network that may be hiring.

item.description: @gruber I use tab groups to name the task I’m working on that requires switching between tabs. That’s as a way to keep my focus on the task and, if I get distracted, I know what those tabs were for. As soon as the task is done, I ruthlessly close the tab group.
item.source:markdown: @gruber I use tab groups to name the task I’m working on that requires switching between tabs. That’s as a way to keep my focus on the task and, if I get distracted, I know what those tabs were for. As soon as the task is done, I ruthlessly close the tab group.

item.description: Anybody need a house sitter in Hamilton in September? I’d like to test-drive living there.
item.source:markdown: Anybody need a house sitter in Hamilton in September? I’d like to test-drive living there.

item.description: It’s still sometimes astonishing to me that people still use Foursquare’s Swarm app.
item.source:markdown: It’s still sometimes astonishing to me that people still use Foursquare’s Swarm app.

item.description: I’ll be in B.C. for an indefinite period starting in mid-August.
item.source:markdown: I’ll be in B.C. for an indefinite period starting in mid-August.

item.description:
Thunder you can feel. #dlws

The disappointing thing about the rain in Toronto is that it never feels cleansing. At least in Vancouver, after the rain, it felt like you could sin without feeling guilty for a few days. Not here.
item.source:markdown:
Thunder you can feel. #dlws
The disappointing thing about the rain in Toronto is that it never feels cleansing. At least in Vancouver, after the rain, it felt like you could sin without feeling guilty for a few days. Not here.

item.description: @T0tallyn0tPr1me Ah, shit. That must have killed. With RTJ on stage. I wondered why they didn’t do a song together in the two shows I saw before that one.
item.source:markdown: @T0tallyn0tPr1me Ah, shit. That must have killed. With RTJ on stage. I wondered why they didn’t do a song together in the two shows I saw before that one.
